mapper.sql: FUID , FULLNAME , DESCRIPTION , CREATEDATE , MODIFYDATE , MODIFYUSERREALNAME , CAMID , IP , PORT , USERNAME , PASSWORD , CHANNEL , DEVTYPE , DEVID , REALTYPE , SREAMIP , STREAMPORT , PROXYIP , PROXYPORT , ACCESSIP , ACCESSPORT , FX , FY
mapper.insert: insert into ob_video ( FUID , FULLNAME , DESCRIPTION , CREATEDATE , MODIFYDATE , MODIFYUSERREALNAME , CAMID , IP , PORT , USERNAME , PASSWORD , CHANNEL , DEVTYPE , DEVID , REALTYPE , SREAMIP , STREAMPORT , PROXYIP , PROXYPORT , ACCESSIP , ACCESSPORT , FX , FY ) values ( #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{camid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{devtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{devid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{realtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{sreamip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{streamport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{proxyip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{proxyport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{accessip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{accessport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{fx,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{fy,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update ob_video
FULLNAME=#{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CREATEDATE=#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
MODIFYDATE=#{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
MODIFYUSERREALNAME=#{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CAMID=#{camid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
IP=#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PORT=#{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
USERNAME=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PASSWORD=#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
CHANNEL=#{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DEVTYPE=#{devtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DEVID=#{devid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
REALTYPE=#{realtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
SREAMIP=#{sreamip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
STREAMPORT=#{streamport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PROXYIP=#{proxyip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PROXYPORT=#{proxyport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ACCESSIP=#{accessip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ACCESSPORT=#{accessport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
FX=#{fx,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
FY=#{fy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ob_video set FULLNAME=#{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DESCRIPTION=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CREATEDATE=#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , MODIFYDATE=#{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , MODIFYUSERREALNAME=#{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CAMID=#{camid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , IP=#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PORT=#{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , USERNAME=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PASSWORD=#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CHANNEL=#{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DEVTYPE=#{devtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DEVID=#{devid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REALTYPE=#{realtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , SREAMIP=#{sreamip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STREAMPORT=#{streamport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PROXYIP=#{proxyip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , PROXYPORT=#{proxyport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ACCESSIP=#{accessip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ACCESSPORT=#{accessport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , FX=#{fx,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , FY=#{fy,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

DELETE FROM ob_video WHERE FUID IN
#{item}
mapper.select:
select
from ob_video where #{0} LIKE concat(cancat('%',#{1}),'%')
